description: Variation of condition 8 (All residential units to comply with the Lifetime Homes Standards, and at least two (2) of the residential units shall be constructed to Wheelchair Housing Standards) of Planning Permission ref: P/2014/4792, dated 06/01/2016 ,for 'Redevelopment of the site to provide a part two and three-storey building fronting Uxbridge Road containing 4 x 2 bed and 2x 1 bed flats and a two storey building fronting Shirley Gardens containing 4 x 1 bed flat (10 private market units in total), refuse storage, cycle storage, amenity space and the provision of 6 car parking spaces (1 disabled) on the frontage with access off Shirley Gardens (following the demolition of existing building on the site) (Resubmission of application PP/2010/5088)'. Variation includes the provision of at least one residential units to comply with Wheelchair Housing Standards.
